languages.text: "Хороший приговор — суровый и справедливый. Смерть не освобождает от ответственности".
languages.translation_comment:
After making it off a corrupted Tech-Priest ship.
Pasqal: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: "Хороший приговор — суровый и справедливый. Смерть не освобождает от ответственности".

languages.text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."
languages.translation_comment:
After making it off a corrupted Tech-Priest ship.
Pasqal: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."
languages.original_text: "Хороший приговор — суровый и справедливый. Смерть не освобождает от ответственности".

traits.locale_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death does not absolve of liability."
"A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death does not absolve of liability."
"A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."
"A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."
"A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."
"A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

languages.text: 「見事な判決だ。厳しく、そして公正だ。死は責任からの逃避ではない」
languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

traits.locale_text: 「見事な判決だ。厳しく、そして公正だ。死は責任からの逃避ではない」

languages.text: "Ein gutes Urteil, streng und gerecht. Der Tod befreit nicht von der Haftbarkeit."
languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

traits.locale_text: "Ein gutes Urteil, streng und gerecht. Der Tod befreit nicht von der Haftbarkeit."

languages.text: « Une sentence exemplaire, à la fois sévère et juste. Même dans la mort, ils paieront pour leurs crimes. »
languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

traits.locale_text: « Une sentence exemplaire, à la fois sévère et juste. Même dans la mort, ils paieront pour leurs crimes. »

languages.text: «Una sentencia muy acertada: dura, pero justa. La muerte no exime de la responsabilidad».
languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

traits.locale_text: «Una sentencia muy acertada: dura, pero justa. La muerte no exime de la responsabilidad».

languages.text: “非常出色的判决，严厉而公正。死亡并不能逃避责任。”
languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

traits.locale_text: “非常出色的判决，严厉而公正。死亡并不能逃避责任。”

languages.text: "Ağır fakat adil bir ceza, hak etmişler. Ölüm dahi olsa vazifeden kaçış yok."
languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."

traits.locale_text: "Ağır fakat adil bir ceza, hak etmişler. Ölüm dahi olsa vazifeden kaçış yok."

languages.original_text: "A well passed sentence — harsh and fair. Death is no escape from liability."
